ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Informant: Household
Notes: WHODAS Rater: Doing HH tasks well + WHODAS Rater: Complete HH Tasks + WHODAS Rater: HH task done as quickly (WHRS12+WHRS13+WHRS14) 1=Rater; 2=Family/Friend; 3=Guardian; 4=1npatient Staff; 5=0ther.

ElementDescription: Informant: Life Activities + Household
Notes: WHODAS Rater: Household responsibilities + WHODAS Rater: Doing HH tasks well + WHODAS Rater: Complete HH Tasks + WHODAS Rater: HH task done as quickly (WHRS2+WHRS12+WHRS13+WHRS14) 1=Rater; 2=Family/Friend; 3=Guardian; 4=1npatient Staff; 5=0ther.

ElementDescription: Days since baseline
Numeric Visit Number
Notes: -1.5 = Pre-Screening; -1 = Screening; 0 = Baseline; ## = Visit ## (from 1 to 10); Whole numbers = standard monthly visits; #.001 - #.009 = Unscheduled; #.1 = End of Phase 1; #.2 = End of Phase 2; #.3 = End of Phase 3; #.4 = End of Open Choice Phase; #.5 = End of Study; #.6 = Genetic Analysis; 1000=all visits

Informant

ElementDescription: Please pick the ONE answer that best describes your health TODAY. Self-Care
Notes: 0= None, I have no problems washing or dressing myself; 1= Mild, I have slight problems washing or dressing myself; 2= Moderate,  I have moderate problems washing or dressing myself; 3= Severe, I have severe problems washing or dressing myself; 4= Extreme or cannot do, I am unable to wash or dress myself; 98= Do not know; 99= No answer

ElementDescription: Please pick the ONE answer that best describes your health TODAY. Pain/Discomfort

ElementDescription: Please pick the ONE answer that best describes your health TODAY. Anxiety/Depression
